nodes.text: Model X was a model of heavy blaster pistol of the "superheavy" designation, and was produced by Caliban.

Packing as much power as possible into its relatively short range of sixty meters, the weapon was was essentially identical in power to the T-6, and shared the same “superheavy” classification due to its abnormally heavy punch. It was designed to compete with the DT-57 heavy blaster pistol and T-6 heavy blaster pistol.

Despite its power the Model X was somewhat fragile, and required a high amount of maintenance and calibration as a result. SoroSuub Corporation saw potential in the design, though, and when the company acquired Caliban from the Empire, SoroSuub redesigned the Model X into the slightly less powerful, but sturdier, Renegade heavy blaster pistol.
Han Solo temporarily used a Caliban Model X, admiring the weapon for its incredible power; even going so far as to compare it to a larger blaster rifle in terms of stopping power.
